column6: The process starts when the SO: Angebot/Auftrag receives a subsidiary order.
The SO: Angebot/Auftrag prepares goods for shipment and then ships the goods, concurrently with preparing the goods and shipping them, the SO: Angebot/Auftrag prepares invoicing.

In case the customer is subsidiary and the subsidiary relationship is not yet modeled, SO: Address- management adds parent company as invoicing address, then the SO: Angebot/Auftrag create the invoice.
column11: subsidiary relationship is not yet modeled
column13: subsidiary relationship is not yet modeled
column16: subsidiary relationship is not yet modeled

column6: Otherwise if the customer is independent or the subsidiary relationship is already modeled in ERP, the SO: Angebot/Auftrag directly creates the invoice.
column11: the subsidiary relationship is already modeled in ERP
column13: the subsidiary relationship is already modeled in ERP

column6: Finally, the SO: Angebot/Auftrag sends the invoice.
